game_description: Free version of Grapple Tournament. Join our Discord for community events: https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC Grapple. Shoot. Score. Master the vertical combat. Grapple Tournament is an arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You can enjoy complete 3D movement freedom by running, double jumping, wall jumping, climbing and using your grappling hook in an alluring stylized world. Fight with more than 12 multifunctional weapons. Plasma pistols, revolvers, energy rifles, shotguns and rocket launchers await your command. Use them in one hand, two handed (with secondary fire) or dual wield for increased damage. If all else fails you always have your energy blade and bow on your side. What is your take? Mobility or firepower? Play multiplayer matches solo or with your friends. Party up and fight in various game modes on maps that were created with verticality in mind. Against players or bots. To prepare for battle, practice in the firing range and drone challenges, and equip customizations and more.
review_1: One of the best vr game based on grapplers for movement I've ever seen and played this game is just awesome 👍👍😎😎👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
review_2: Every time I start the game it shows the title it Crashes.
review_3: do you like Unreal Tournament, Quake 3 ? you're gonna love this! Excellent movement/locomotion and gun handling/physics. Smooth, Fast, Fun, Comfortable
review_4: If they just simply add more content and get on the official store it will absolutely blow up. This games movement is better than any other mainstream FPS. Incredible.
review_5: Probably not for those prone to motion sickness since you are swinging around on a grapple most of the time. But super fast paced fun. Demo version cannot start an online multiplayer game...however a friend with paid full version can start multiplayer game with demo version players after they are partied up with them from their social menu. So demo version players can play multiplayer with friends as long as one person has paid version to start game.
